entry.title: Multifunction Breastfeeding Pillow Adjustable Nursing Pillow Infant Feeding Support
entry.summary:
Vendor: Brisita
Type: Nursing Pillows
Price: 57.59

Breastfeeding your baby is a wonderful way to create a loving bond, but the strain caused by cradling your baby in the perfect position can be a drag. Having a nursing pillow on hand can give you the necessary arm and body support during breastfeeding sessions.

Brisita gives you the best nursing pillows to accommodate an array of breastfeeding positions.



High Quality Material: The pillow is made of cotton, featuring PP cotton padding. Pad plus cotton, soft and comfortable. Preferred original good cotton, soft skin-friendly, suitable for baby growth and development, so that the baby is more comfortable
Three adjustable heights allow you to choose the right height and get the best comfort, easy for a mom to make it the best fit for babies in different age groups. The nursing pillow can provide soft and comfortable support for your baby while breastfeeding, reduce mom's neck and back pain.
Elevate your little one to breast height for improved latching; Supports upright nursing positions for little ones with acid reflux or GERD; Supports a variety of nursing positions including cross-cradle or football positions
Easy to Store Clean, and Easy to Carry: Ribbon included for easy storage. Foldable in any way, with ribbon fastening and convenient to carry out for travel. Machine wash in gentle mode can be dried
13.8 x 11.2 x 9 inches

entry.title: Inflatable Baby Bathtub, Children'S Thickened Household Bathtub, Baby Foldable And Storage Bathtub
entry.summary:
Vendor: Brisita
Type: Baby Bathtub
Price: 69.32

Safe Materials: The inflatable baby bathtub is made of Environmental protection PVC material, durable and non-toxic, soft and smooth, easy to clean.


Brisita Inflatable Baby Bathtub: Air pump included, Non-slip surface, The bottom of the inflated air column supports the infant around the legs, preventing him from slipping in the water and ensuring his safety and comfort. Easy to Drain: The tub has a simple drain plug in the bottom that makes draining the tub a breeze. Bath accessories such as baby shampoo, soap, towel, small toys, and other items can be stored in the side pocket. Ideal Dimensions: When the tub is deflated, it may easily be folded for transport and storage.


  • ★【High-quality Materials】The babies inflatable bathtub is made of high-quality PVC material, which is durable and beautiful in appearance. Can be used indoors or outdoors.
  • ★【Zipper Cover】Equipped with a zipper cover, you can close the zipper to form a closed space to contain heat and keep the water temperature you want, keeping you warm for a longer time.
  • ★【Comfortable Design】The backrest and headrest are added, and the bathtub has better support and cushioning. It can be used to additionally support the back and head to provide better comfort.
  • ★【Automatic Inflation】Automatic wireless inflation only takes a few minutes to inflate and can be folded and stored after deflation, saving a lot of bathroom space. It is a perfect substitute for traditional bathtubs.
  • ★【Multifunctional】The inflatable bathtub can be used as a medicinal bath, milk bath, flower bath, and a baby pool.

 

Size Information

  • 26*19.5*8CM


Packing list

  • Inflatable bathtub X1
  • air pump X1
